title: Edit property
description: Edit configuration for a particular property.

type.description: Type of this edit property as a field.

description.description: A short description shown under the edit field.

infoContent.description: Content of the info-box. If this or infoTitle has not been set, no info will be available. This is an array, where each entry represents a paragraph in the info-box. All paragraphs are localized.

infoTitle.description: Title for the info-box. See description for infoContent.

width.description: Width of this field in the form (as css definition, e.g. '100px' or '20%').

visibleConditions.description: Conditions for the visibility of this item.

enabledConditions.description: Conditions for the enabled state of this item.

validationRules.description: Rules for the validation of this item.

required.description: If set to true, this property is required when editing. If 'required' validation rule is set, this default option will be overridden.

inline.description: If set to true, this element will be displayed inline.

multiline.description: If true, text field will be multiline.
